verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> you have been <S%H7521>favorable<s%> to your <S%H776>land:<s%> you have <S%H7725>brought<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>
You have <S%H5375>forgiven<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> you have <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sin.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
You have <S%H5375>taken<s%> away <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5678>wrath:<s%> you have <S%H7725>turned<s%> yourself from the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of your <S%H639>anger.<s%>
<S%H7725>Turn<s%> us, O <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and cause your <S%H3708>anger<s%> <S%H5973>toward<s%> us to <S%H6565>cease.<s%>
Will you be <S%H599>angry<s%> with us for <S%H5769>ever?<s%> will you <S%H4900>draw<s%> out your <S%H639>anger<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations?<s%>
Will you not <S%H2421>revive<s%> us <S%H7725>again:<s%> that your <S%H5971>people<s%> may <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in you?
<S%H7200>Show<s%> us your <S%H2617>mercy,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5414>grant<s%> us your <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

I will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1696>speak:<s%> for he will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and to his <S%H2623>saints:<s%> but let them not <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3690>folly.<s%>
<S%H389>Surely<s%> his <S%H3468>salvation<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> him; that <S%H3519>glory<s%> may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in our <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H2617>Mercy<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> are <S%H6298>met<s%> together; <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> have <S%H5401>kissed<s%> each other.
<S%H571>Truth<s%> shall <S%H6779>spring<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> shall <S%H8259>look<s%> down from <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> that which is <S%H2896>good;<s%> and our <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5414>yield<s%> her <S%H2981>increase.<s%>
<S%H6664>Righteousness<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and shall <S%H7760>set<s%> us in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of his <S%H6471>steps.<s%>
